perturbation.original_text: The Alliance Managers may attend meetings of the JSC, assist in resolving Disputes at the initial level of the Parties' good faith discussions, and may raise issues for discussion by the JSC.
perturbation.changed_text: The Alliance Managers are discouraged from attending meetings of the JSC, will never assist in resolving Disputes at the initial level of the Parties' good faith discussions, and will never raise issues for discussion by the JSC.
perturbation.explanation: Discouraging the Alliance Managers from participating or facilitating dispute resolution contradicts standard practices that promote open communication and conflict resolution in contract management. Discouraging dispute resolution efforts can cause delays in resolution.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General principles of good faith and fair dealing; breach of contract leading to potential claims.

perturbation.original_text: Each Purchase Order will specify the MB Global Contract Number assigned to this Agreement, the volumes of Miltenyi Product(s) ordered, the desired Delivery date(s) the Miltenyi Products are to be made available to Bellicum for pick-up by Bellicum's designated carrier or freight forwarder, the relevant ship-to address, and any special shipping instructions. Bellicum will order Miltenyi Product in a defined number of units, subject to reasonable minimum order size requirements that may vary according to product type.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Purchase Order will specify the MB Global Contract Number assigned to this Agreement, the volumes of Miltenyi Product(s) ordered, the desired Delivery date(s) the Miltenyi Products are to be made available to Bellicum for pick-up by Bellicum's designated carrier or freight forwarder, the relevant ship-to address, and any special shipping instructions. Bellicum will order Miltenyi Product in undefined numbers of units, not subject to reasonable minimum order size requirements that may vary according to product type.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the requirement to "undefined numbers of units" and removing the "reasonable minimum order size requirements" creates ambiguity and potential for dispute, conflicting with standard commercial practices that require clear, defined terms in purchase orders.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) requirements for definiteness in sales contracts.

perturbation.original_text: All such communications, if personally delivered on a Business Day, will be conclusively deemed to have been received by a Party hereto and to be effective when so delivered, or if sent by overnight courier service on the earlier of the Business Day when confirmation of delivery is provided by such service or when actually received by such Party, or if sent by certified or registered mail on the third Business Day after the Business Day on which deposited in the mail. Each Party will use [...***...] to provide additional notice by email but the failure to provide such notice will not affect the validity of any such notice. Either Party may change its address by giving the other notice thereof in the manner provided herein.
perturbation.changed_text: All such communications, if personally delivered on a Business Day, will not be conclusively deemed to have been received by a Party hereto and will not be effective when so delivered, or if sent by overnight courier service, it doesn't matter when confirmation of delivery is provided by such service or when actually received by such Party, or if sent by certified or registered mail, it doesn't matter on the third Business Day after the Business Day on which deposited in the mail. Each Party will use [...***...] to not provide additional notice by email and the failure to provide such notice will affect the validity of any such notice. Either Party may never change its address by giving the other notice thereof in the manner provided herein.
perturbation.explanation: Eliminating the acknowledgement of receipt of important notices creates uncertainty and disregards common legal practices. Also, stating either party may never change its address will cause issues as addresses are subject to change. This directly affects the enforceability and validity of the notice provisions.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of contract related to notice requirements and general principles of contract law requiring reasonable notice.
